title: CREATE_RUNTIME_TEXTURE_FROM_IMAGE
content:
0x786D8BC3// CreateRuntimeTextureFromImage
long CREATE_RUNTIME_TEXTURE_FROM_IMAGE(long txd, char* txn, char* fileName);Parameters:txd: A handle to the runtime TXD to create the runtime texture in.txn: The name for the texture in the runtime texture dictionary.fileName: The file name of an image to load or a base64 data URL. This should preferably be a PNG, and has to be specified as a file in the resource manifest.Returns: A runtime texture handle.Creates a runtime texture from the specified file in the current resource or a base64 data URL.
codeBlocks:
// CreateRuntimeTextureFromImage
long CREATE_RUNTIME_TEXTURE_FROM_IMAGE(long txd, char* txn, char* fileName);
